Name: Marimba VR
About the game: Marimba VR is a great way for percussionists to practice their instrument at home as well as a fun game in which to relax and play some music. It takes advantage of something amazing about virtual reality - being able to practice something in-game and having that skill translate to the real world.
Meta Title: Marimba VR: Jan 2, 2017, Ruby Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Marimba VR? Check out the release date (Jan 2, 2017), developer insights from Ruby Games, and a complete game summary.
